lead_paragraph: Defending Monte Carlo champion and world number one Novak Djokovic suffered his earliest tournament defeat for three years when 55th-ranked Czech Jiri Vesely beat him in the second round of the Masters tournament on Wednesday.
snippet: Defending Monte Carlo champion and world number one Novak Djokovic suffered his earliest tournament defeat for three years when 55th-ranked Czech Jiri Vesely beat him in the second round of the Masters tournament on Wednesday....

headline.main: Djokovic Exits Monte Carlo as Vesely Scores Biggest Career Win
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Exits Monte Carlo as Vesely Scores Biggest Career Win
